sentences.sContent: Several local officials are in jail on charges of colluding with the Mafia.
sentences.sCn: 几位地方官员因涉嫌串通黑手党而锒铛入狱。

remMethod.val: col(共同) + lud(玩弄) + e → 共同玩弄 → 串通

trans.tranCn: 串通, 勾结, 共谋
trans.tranOther: to work with someone secretly, especially in order to do something dishonest or illegal
